member.name: T:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem
member.summary: Class for accessing Swap file systems.

member.name: M:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SwapFileSystem class.
member.param: The stream containing the file system.

member.name: P:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem.FriendlyName
member.summary: Gets the friendly name for the file system.

member.name: M:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem.Detect(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Detects if a stream contains a Swap file system.
member.returns: true if the stream appears to be a Swap file system, else false.

member.name: P:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem.Size
member.summary: Size of the Filesystem in bytes

member.name: P:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem.UsedSpace
member.summary: Used space of the Filesystem in bytes

member.name: P:DiscUtils.Swap.SwapFileSystem.AvailableSpace
member.summary: Available space of the Filesystem in bytes
